chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 mini has a problem:

The invoice is missing NIE number Y8114126Q.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile:

I hope you are having a great day.

The customer reports that the invoice is missing the NIE Y8114126Q. He requests that you add the NIE on the invoice, and we will provide it to him as soon as possible.

Can you please send us the invoice within 48 hours? If we do not receive it in time, we will be forced to apply the Back Market letter and grant a commercial gesture to the customer for 20% of the order.

Please make sure that the invoice contains:
1. The IMEI number (if the device is a smartphone)
2. the customer's billing address (which may be different from the delivery address)
3. the mention [VAT not applicable “Special regime - second hand goods”] or any other equivalent (if you are in marginal VAT regime).
If you need more information about the invoice, here is an article that will answer your questions: https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/360019750759-Comment-%C3%A9tablir-une -B2C-invoice-complies-%C3%A0-the-r%C3%A8regulation-

We're counting on you! Thank you very much.

I will be waiting for your message.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let us know if the customer requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile:

All is well, thanks for your cooperation.

Have a great day.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team
